entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Hornepayne
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:27 PM EST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -5.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Nagagami 12:00 AM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023

Pressure / Tendency: 100.5 kPa rising
Humidity: 89 %

Wind: SW 6 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Wind west 20 km/h becoming south 20 late this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Increasing cloudiness. High 6.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness near noon. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High 6. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries in the evening and after midnight. Periods of snow mixed with rain beginning after midnight. Local snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 13 February 2023
